<!-- ## About Me -->

I'm a physicist, engineering exec, investor.

I am an scientist, engineering exec, and investor.

Some things about me:

  - Born and brought up in New Delhi, India. I still consider myself a Delhi native
  - Went to school at IIT Delhi for EE (B.Tech.), Caltech for Applied Physics (Ph.D.)
  - Live in SF and like to spend my time here and in NCR India

  Over the years I have done some interesting technical work. Reverse chronologically:

  - Created an [ML based risk framework](https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1514587/000119312522005696/d145731ds1.htm) i.e. risk score, to improve cost of risk car sharing marketplace (Turo)
  - Conceived and created [geospatial analytics platform](https://orbitalinsight.com/geospatial-technology) (Orbital Insight)
  - Founded and was technical editor for the first [universal stylus initiative specification](https://universalstylus.org/) (Intel)
  - Architected [forcepad](https://www.synaptics.com/products/touchpad-family/forcepad-product) and palm rejection (Synaptics)
  - One of the 2 scientists to build out the quantum computing experiments group. [List](https://scholar.google.com/scholar?hl=en&as_sdt=0%2C5&q=shwetank+kumar+quantum+computing&btnG=&oq=shwetank+kumar+quantum+comp) of publications (IBM)
